object.name: UniqueGiftModel
object.description: This object describes the model of a unique gift.
object.html_description: This object describes the model of a unique gift.
object.rst_description: This object describes the model of a unique gift.

annotations.description: The sticker that represents the unique gift
annotations.html_description: The sticker that represents the unique gift
annotations.rst_description: The sticker that represents the unique gift
annotations.name: sticker

annotations.description: The number of unique gifts that receive this model for every 1000 gift upgrades. Always 0 for crafted gifts.
annotations.html_description: The number of unique gifts that receive this model for every 1000 gift upgrades. Always 0 for crafted gifts.
annotations.rst_description: The number of unique gifts that receive this model for every 1000 gift upgrades. Always 0 for crafted gifts.
annotations.name: rarity_per_mille

annotations.description: Rarity of the model if it is a crafted model. Currently, can be 'uncommon', 'rare', 'epic', or 'legendary'.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Rarity of the model if it is a crafted model. Currently, can be “uncommon”, “rare”, “epic”, or “legendary”.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Rarity of the model if it is a crafted model. Currently, can be 'uncommon', 'rare', 'epic', or 'legendary'.
annotations.name: rarity
